insert into iodata (HolderNo, HolderName, IODate, IOStatus, UnitNo, UnitName, DeviceNo, DeviceName, DeviceSN, DoorName, ChannelNo, ChannelName, LocatName, OpenType, OpenTypeName, PhotoStr, Photo) values (#{holderno}, #{holdername}, NOW(), #{iostatus}, #{unitno}, #{unitname}, #{deviceno}, #{devicename}, #{devicesn}, #{doorname}, #{channelno}, #{channelname}, #{locatname}, #{opentype}, #{opentypename}, #{iophotostr}, #{photo});
insert into alarmpeople (HolderNo, HolderName, ChannelNo, ChannelName, IOStatus, Source, SourceName, IODate, DeviceNo, DeviceName, DeviceSN, DoorName, LocatName, State, PhotoStr, Photo) values (#{holderno}, #{holdername}, #{channelno}, #{channelname}, #{iostatus}, #{source}, #{sourcename}, NOW(), #{deviceno}, #{devicename}, #{devicesn}, #{doorname}, #{locatname}, #{state}, #{alarmphotostr}, #{photo});
